result.markdown:
---
title: "Morphological predictability - HS"
subtitle: "Data file clean-up"
author: "Joseph V. Casillas"
date: "2022-05-08"
format: html
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
source(here::here("scripts", "00_libraries.R"))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Load data
dat_10ms <- read_csv(here("data", "det_10ms_onset_2syllable.csv")) 
dat_50ms <- read_csv(here("data", "det_50ms_onset_syllable.csv"))  

# Check number of participants
ids_10ms <- dat_10ms %>% pull(participant) %>% unique()
ids_50ms <- dat_50ms %>% pull(participant) %>% unique()

length(ids_10ms) == length(ids_50ms)
```

::: {.cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] FALSE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
length(ids_50ms) - length(ids_10ms)  
```

::: {.cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 2
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# The 50ms df has 2 more participants, so we need to find out who is 
# missing from the 10ms data
dat_50ms %>% 
  filter(!(participant %in% ids_10ms)) %>% 
  pull(participant) %>% 
  unique
```

::: {.cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "ies15" "mon01"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# dat_10ms doesn't include ies15 or mon01
dat_10ms %>% filter(participant %in% c("ies15", "mon01"))
```

::: {.cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 0 × 21
# … with 21 variables: participant <chr>, target <chr>, bin <dbl>,
#   noun_transparency <chr>, structure <chr>, gender <chr>, target_count <dbl>,
#   target_prop <dbl>, eLog <dbl>, wts <dbl>, landmark <chr>, lm_bin <dbl>,
#   t_onset <lgl>, time_zero <dbl>, group <chr>, DELE <dbl>, es_pc_week <dbl>,
#   ospan_en_val <dbl>, ospan_en_sd <dbl>, ospan_es_val <dbl>,
#   ospan_es_sd <dbl>
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# So we will filter them out of dat_50ms to have the same number of 
# participants in each dataframe
```
:::


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dat_10ms %>% 
  group_by(participant) %>% 
  group_walk(~ write_csv(.x, 
    here("data", "by_id_10ms", 
      paste0(.y$participant, "_10ms_onset_2syllable.csv"))))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dat_50ms %>% 
  filter(!(participant %in% c("ies15", "mon01"))) %>% 
  group_by(participant) %>% 
  group_walk(~ write_csv(.x, 
    here("data", "by_id_50ms", 
      paste0(.y$participant, "_50ms_onset_syllable.csv"))))
```
:::
